A52HackTool 1.3.0
Turnkey & easy to use tool for cracking the GSM A5/2 cipher
  • Main Page
  • Data Structures
  • Files
A52HackTool Documentation

Introduction

This tool is related to the paper Implementation and performance analysis of Barkan, Biham and Keller's attack on A5/2 written by Nicolas Paglieri & Olivier Benjamin on the 8th of June 2011.
You can find this article on the project webpage: <http://www.ni69.info/security-gsm-en.php>
